title: Why this name not unacceptable
body: Yesterday my friend tried to rename his acc to ShojoA but the client said it is not acceptable. Any name include shojo is unacceptable...I wonder why lol

replies.body: I can't really think of anything that would make it filtered.  Have your friend reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  As long as he has the needed currency, we can look into his issue individually.  We'll reply as soon as we can!
